metadata.name: Blue-tooth Girl - LEFT #001 "GIVE IT YOUR BREATH"
metadata.description:
I think “non-fungible” represents life itself. 
Life’s value is inequivalent for everybody. 
Nothing can compensate for it. 

Art productions mostly lose people who admit the value because they are regarded to be over their expiration date. 
I dare to choose the seasonal theme called Christmas. 
The value of arts should not be subject to change by trend. 
Even one doesn’t have any precious feelings for a thing, other can have it for the same one. 
I wish that someone gives our art breath even after I disappear from this world. 
People might think it “fossil.” 
But I just hope this art of us keeps on celebrating TODAY’s Christmas no matter how much time passes by us. 
Merry Christmas. 

----

Size: 1920x1080
File: MP4
Software: CLIP STUDIO PAINT EX, Live2D, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Audition
Length: 1min
Production Period: 2021/11/05 - 2021/12/25

Voice: Naoko
Translation: Ryoji
